title: Sunset Bliss
short_description: A serene view of a sunset over the ocean.
description: This painting captures the tranquil beauty of a sunset with vibrant hues of orange and purple reflecting on the water.

title: Mountain Majesty
short_description: Snow-capped peaks under a bright blue sky.
description: This artwork showcases the grandeur of mountains with intricate textures and dynamic lighting.

title: Forest Whisper
short_description: A quiet path through a dense forest.
description: With shades of green and brown, this painting evokes a sense of mystery and peace found in nature.

title: Cityscape Dream
short_description: A vibrant city skyline at dusk.
description: This painting captures the energy of the city with colorful lights and dramatic skies.
